home.title: Home
home.description:
Chrome extension to provide quick access to your Google Drive items.
This is an open source software.
home.function-05: Link to top page of Google Drive

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content-01:
tearoom6 ("we", "us", or "our") operates the Quick Drive Chrome extension (the "Extension").

This page informs you of our policies regarding the use of personal data when you use our Extension.

We use your data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Extension, you agree to the use of information in accordance with this policy.
privacy.content-02: Quick Drive connects to external services of Google Inc. through OAuth. Data which is retrieved from the external services contains basic user information and Google Drive contents. Data which is retrieved from the external services is used only for functions of the Extension.
privacy.content-03: We does not collect various personal data in various places except inside the Extension and Chrome browser itself.
privacy.content-04: If you click on a third party link in the Extension, you will be directed to that third party's site that are not operated by us. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.
privacy.content-05: We are not responsible for any damages caused by using the Extension.
privacy.content-06:
We may update our Privacy Policy to comply with laws. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
privacy.content-07:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

By email: tearoom6.biz@gmail.com
